overview: Thirty-four Men. Twelve Scenes. Two Discs. Four Hot Hours of Military Secrets in One Sizzling Collection. In and out of uniform these hard and horny soldiers know just what any good officer expects... and they're always ready to go the extra mile for their commander in Military Secrets. From bunkmates to bivouac buddies the men of Falcon know the value of tight camaraderie, flawless discipline and unit cohesiveness. Raise a salute to the military men who know how to go the distance to accomplish their mission.
title: Falcon Four Hours: Military Secrets
